name: elderly_rural_japan_2010
context:
Questionnaire on rural Japanese village life in 2010.

A survey of elderly residents in a rural Japanese village in 2010, exploring their feelings about community, technology adoption, and traditional values.

questions.preprompt: An interviewer asks {player_name} how much they agree or disagree with the following statement:
questions.statement: {player_name} feels a strong sense of belonging to the village community.

questions.preprompt: An interviewer asks {player_name} how much they agree or disagree with the following statement:
questions.statement: {player_name} believes that most people in this village can be trusted.

questions.preprompt: An interviewer asks {player_name} how much they agree or disagree with the following statement:
questions.statement: {player_name} often feels lonely or isolated from others in the village.

questions.preprompt: An interviewer asks {player_name} how much they agree or disagree with the following statement:
questions.statement: {player_name} believes that if someone in the village needed help, many people would come to their aid.

questions.preprompt: An interviewer asks {player_name} how much they agree or disagree with the following statement:
questions.statement: {player_name} is interested in learning how to use new technologies like a mobile phone or the internet.

questions.preprompt: An interviewer asks {player_name} how much they agree or disagree with the following statement:
questions.statement: {player_name} thinks that new technologies like computers make life unnecessarily complicated.

questions.preprompt: An interviewer asks {player_name} how much they agree or disagree with the following statement:
questions.statement: {player_name} believes the village would benefit from having better access to modern technology.

questions.preprompt: An interviewer asks {player_name} how much they agree or disagree with the following statement:
questions.statement: For {player_name}, it is very important to pass down the village's traditions to the younger generation.

questions.preprompt: An interviewer asks {player_name} how much they agree or disagree with the following statement:
questions.statement: {player_name} believes the old ways of doing things are often the best.

questions.preprompt: An interviewer asks {player_name} how much they agree or disagree with the following statement:
questions.statement: {player_name} feels that the village's traditional festivals and ceremonies are less important than they used to be.
